original_title: Three men arrested for brutal murder in Meegahathenna
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Three people were arrested by Sri Lanka Police for stabbing to death a 38-year-old man in Meegahathenna, Pelawatte. Sri Lanka Police have confirmed that the arrested individuals, aged 25, 36, and 40, are residents of Meeghathanna.
The suspects are to appear before the Mathugama Magistrate's Court, where further legal proceedings will take place.
